name: SD Squared
description:
sd2 labs (formerly SMX iExplore) is a boutique complete services software & application development company that has been operating for the last 6 years with a team that has been in the industry for over a decade.
Their software has touched over 5 million users in banking, television and cloud computing, and we work for some of the largest companies in their respective markets; they are truly vertical agnostic, the only thing that connects us to their customers is their drive for something new, something fresh and something beautiful.
